channel.title: How do i get a no-ip to work?
channel.description: i've done the tuts on how to get a no-ip to work. i use hamachi atm but the no-ip isn't working... could ya'll tell me SPECIFICLLY tell me on how to get one to work? thanks!

item.title: How do i get a no-ip to work?
item.dc:creator: @fishypoo101 fishypoo101
item.description:
@fishypoo101 wrote:

i tryed that and only players in my hamachi network could log on with the no-ip.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i get a no-ip to work?

item.title: How do i get a no-ip to work?
item.dc:creator: @cccrrraaazzziii cccrrraaazzziii
item.description:
@cccrrraaazzziii wrote:

There is a way to get a No-IP without the use of the router. I managed it myself for my own server.

It requires you going on Hamachi, and using your Hamachi IP, then registering at No-IP.com with your Hamachi IP. When you have an IP registered (the IP should be your Hamachi IP), give it a go.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i get a no-ip to work?
